alert.note: Alert for Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Laramie Range; Shirley Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 10:44AM MST until January 19 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches expected, with locally higher amounts possible. Areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...North Laramie Range, Ferris/Seminoe/Shirley Mountains,and Shirley Basin. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions possible. Drifting snow may result in pockets of slick road conditions. Visibilities may be reduced to under one half mile at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Laramie Range; Shirley Basin
